original_title: Unter Blinden: Das extreme Leben des Andy Holzer
overview: Andy Holzer is an extreme mountaineer and has climbed six of the "Seven Summits". What distinguishes him from other professional mountaineers? He is blind. For "Unter Blinden - The Extreme Life of Andy Holzer" Eva Spreitzhofer embarks on a journey into a strange, unknown world for sighted people.
title: Unter Blinden: Das extreme Leben des Andy Holzer
